description_fit.description: Overshirt in woven fabric with a brushed finish. Loose fit with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and open chest pockets. Gently rounded hem. Lined.
T-shirt in lightweight cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and a straight-cut hem. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.
T-shirt in lightweight cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and a straight-cut hem. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline and low dropped shoulders.

Loose-fit top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered text motif on the chest and a soft brushed inside. High, double-layered collar, a zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Oversized shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke with a box pleat at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Zip-through hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, a zip down the front, diagonal, welt side pockets and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

Hoodie in midweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

Shirt in washed Oxford cotton with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a hanger at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

5-pocket jeans in cotton denim with a slight stretch for good comfort. Straight leg and a regular fit from the waist to the hem with a comfortable, looser feel around the whole leg. Regular waist and a zip fly. This is denim that lasts.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with print motifs, a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and a straight-cut hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a skinny fit from the waist to the hem. High waist with a zip fly and button.

Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front and a soft brushed inside. Round, rib-trimmed neckline, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with print motifs, a round, rib-trimmed neckline, dropped shoulders and a straight-cut hem. Loose fit for a generous but not oversized silhouette.

Shirt in soft cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Relaxed fit with an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a sleeve placket with a link button. Gently rounded hem.

Rugby shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, concealed button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Small slit at each side of the hem. Regular fit for comfortable wear and a classic silhouette.
Oversized T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline and low dropped shoulders.
Regular-fit jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round, rib-trimmed neckline, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in slightly stretchy denim with an extra-high waist, zip fly and gently tapered legs.
